name: France
description: 'Dog' in French is 'Chien'! Here we see a Chien with a cool hat next to the Eifel Tower.Hou la la!

name: Italy
description:
The official language of the Vatican City is Italian! In Italian, 'Dog' is 'Cane'! Here we see a cunning Cane posing as the Pope with proper posture.

Salute!

name: Greece
description:
In Greek 'σκύλος (skýlos)'! Here we see a stunning Skýlos wearing endearing emperor clothing.

Opa!

name: Holland
description: In Dutch, 'Dog' is 'Hond'! Here we see an honest Hond honoring Holland with a Holland heritage haircut. Gefeli!

name: Ireland
description: In Irish, 'Dog' is 'Madra'! Here we see a magnificent Madra sporting a marvelous lepperchaun costume. Top O' the Mornin'!

name: Norway
description: In Norwegian, 'Dog' is 'Hund'! Here we see an honorable Hund lookimg heroic in a viking costume. Argh!

name: USA
description: Here we have an all-American dog looking dashing in an Uncle Sam outfit! WOW!
